mapper.select: SELECT pat_id AS patID , nur_id AS patPass, doc_id AS patName, pat_pass AS patGen, pat_name AS patPhone, pat_gen AS patEmail, pat_jumin AS patJob, pat_addr AS patJumin, pat_phone AS patAddr, pat_email AS docID, pat_job AS nurID FROM Patient WHERE pat_id = #{id}
SELECT pat_name FROM Patient WHERE pat_id = #{id}
